sentences.sContent: The kitchen was small and cramped.
The troops slept in cramped conditions with up to 20 in a single room.
sentences.sCn: 士兵们睡在拥挤的环境里，一个房间多达20人。

synos.tran: 用夹钳夹；约束（cramp的过去分词）

remMethod.val: 在狭窄的(cramped)纸上写字显得密密麻麻的(crammed)

words.tran: 狭窄的；难解的；受限制的
痉挛，绞痛；[五金] 铁夹钳
束缚，限制；使…抽筋；以铁箍扣紧

trans.tranCn: 狭小的， 狭窄的； 受限制的； 密小难认的
trans.tranOther: a cramped room, building etc does not have enough space for the people in it
